name: Play Beach Soccer Match - A real football tournament on world popular beaches 2015
name_original: Play Beach Soccer Match - A real football tournament on world popular beaches 2015
description:
Playing soccer on soft sand is always enjoyable, here comes the realistic beach soccer game with dynamic music. Download this game for ultimate fun. Your objective should be to beat your opponent with highest number of goals.

Beach soccer is a real soccer simulation game with stunning graphics and smooth game play.


=======
Controls
=======
-Smart joystick control can be used to move player
-Sprint control to boost up running speed
-Perfect Snatch to snatch ball from opponent very quickly
-Kick control to make a powerful kick
-Pass control to pass the ball to friendly player
-Tackle control to snatch ball from opponent player when its near


============
Beach Stadium
============
-Elegant new beach stadium new sea shore.
-Full of enthusiastic soccer fans and cheerleaders.


=======
Rewards
=======
-Get incentive stars on winning a game.
-3 Stars will be rewarded if you manage to beat opponent from more then 3 goals
-2 Stars will be rewarded if you beat opponent from 2 goals
-1 Star will be rewarded if you beat opponent from 1 goal


===========
Cheerleaders
===========
-Stunning cheerleaders are there to entertain crowd and players


===========
Game Modes
===========
-There are total 11 teams picked from world's top chart.
-Select your team from world's top teams of beach soccer and start match.
-You can also select opponent team to play with.


===========
Social Features
===========
-Share your score with friends on Facebook
-Shout on social media when you manage to beat your opponent team in match
-Invite friends to play game
-Make your place in global leader board and compete players from all over the world


=======
Feedback
=======
If you have any suggested features or improvements please leave a comment, or send us an email at techmowo@gmail.com. In case something is not working correctly please let us know, I'll be glad to fix that.
